17
18#include <stdarg.h>
19#include <stdio.h>
20#include <string.h>
21
22static int testfunc(char **, const char *, ...);
23
24
25static int
26testfunc(char **ret, const char *format, ...)
27{
28 va_list ap;
29 int irc;
30
31 va_start(ap, format);
32 irc = vasprintf(ret, format, ap);
33 va_end(ap);
34
35 return irc;
36}
37
38int
39main(void)
40{
41 char *ret;
42
43 if (testfunc(&ret, "%s.", "Text") != 5)
44 return 1;
45 if (strcmp(ret, "Text."))
46 return 2;
47 return 0;
48}
49
